(Kelly of the Clue Crew shows us a smooth car at the Petersen Automotive Museum in Los Angeles.)  Containing no sharp edges, the aesthetic & technical achievements of the 1947Cisitalia 202 GTwere enough for this progressive New York City museum to consider it a work of art & put it on display
